casebody.data:
S.C., Appellant-Petitioner,
v.
NEW JERSEY DEPARTMENT OF CHILDREN AND FAMILIES, Respondent-Respondent. M-739 September Term 2018
M-740 September Term 2018
081870 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 8, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions of the Legal Services of New Jersey for leave to file a motion for leave to appear as amicus curiae as within time (M-739) and to file a brief and argue as amicus curiae (M-740) are granted. Oral argument is limited to five minutes.
